description: MARC record representation, compatible with MarcEdit's JSON export and import

id.description: id (UUID) of this MARC record, equals to the id of the instance record

leader.description: The first field of a MARC record. Fixed length (24 characters). Data elements that primarily provide information for the processing of the record.

fields.description: The variable fields of a MARC record, each identified by a three-character numeric tag.
